{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.21424v1", "title": "Analysis of modulated linear wave packets and gap solitons in coupled
  optical fibers", "summary": "A coupled pair of waveguides with refractive indices of different signs is
considered. It is shown that the gap in the linear wave spectrum closes if
these waves are amplitude modulated. To look for solitons as envelopes of
exponentially modulated wave packets, the dispersion law of these packets is
used. Different decompositions of the dispersion law lead to solutions related
to different parts of the spectrum. Numerical calculations demonstrate a good
agreement with analytical predictions.", "main_category": "physics.optics", "categories": "physics.optics", "published": "2025-04-30T08:28:41Z"}
